attributes.additional_details:
Stories on child soldiers have been in the news recently, I’m sure many of you have heard of one of the Child Soldiers leader Joseph Kony, the leader of the group LRA (Lord Resistance Army). The government are still out to catch him but he is still on the run creating more havoc everywhere he goes. Over 100,000 children have been part of this. This is still happening in places like Libya.
We want to raise awareness about how children in Congo, Uganda and children who live in towns and villages in the Middle East aren’t safe from the terror of being kidnapped and used.
We want as much people as possible to sign this, if you can please send it to other people. We need to try raise as much awareness as possible.
